Name: Master Show VR
About the game: Two game modes: stage defender and stage control Control your stage lights & effects with drumsticks: LEDs, pyrotechnics, smoke, lasers, holograms and a giant screen camera. 36 characters to customize your stage: singers, dancers, musicians. Enjoy your mp3 music on your hard drive : Rock, Pop, Classical, Reggae, Rap, Metal... Two game modes: stage defender and stage control Oculus Quest 2 + link cable compatible. You control your lights with drumsticks! 9 musicians with these instruments: electric guitar, drums, bass guitar, music keyboard, piano, violin, bongo drum, trumpet and saxophone. 18 singers of different styles in two genres, female and male. K-pop, pop, classic pop, rap, reggae, ballad, rock, guitarist and pianist. 9 fun dancers and chorus girls to set the stage: Dancing girl, dancing boy, bear, happy face, led costume, female choir, male choir, mysterious choristers.
